title: Integration Testing and Final Verification
objectives: Combine changes across all components, run integration tests, and verify that authentication, REST client, and websocket communications work cohesively.
deliverables: A complete set of passing integration tests and documentations confirming seamless integration of the updated modules.
starter_prompt: Run the full test suite and perform manual tests as necessary to ensure all components interact correctly after the updates. Capture logs and output discrepancies for further review.
notes: Ensure final integration passes all tests and update related documentation as needed.
